[File: v2_token_datas.rs::TokenDataV2::get_v1_from_write_table_item()] [Missing Token Data ID Warning] Only logs warning if key not TokenDataId - can mismatched keys create orphaned V1 token data? (Medium)

[File: v2_token_datas.rs::TokenDataV2::is_address_token()] [Retry Race Condition] Retries 5 times with 500ms delay - can race between token creation and query cause false negatives in token detection? (Medium)
[File: v2_token_datas.rs::TokenDataV2::get_by_token_data_id()] [SQL Query Injection] Uses sql_query with bind - can special characters in token_data_id cause unexpected behavior? (Low)

[File: v2_token_datas.rs::TokenDataV2::get_v2_from_write_resource()] [Decimals Field Validation] decimals cast from u8 to i64 - can this cause issues with fungible tokens having fractional amounts? (Low)

[File: v2_token_datas.rs::TokenDataV2::get_v1_from_write_table_item()] [Decimals Zero for V1] V1 tokens hardcoded to 0 decimals - can this cause incompatibility issues if V1 tokens later support decimals? (Low)

[File: v2_token_ownerships.rs::TokenOwnershipV2::get_nft_v2_from_token_data()] [Fungible Filter Bypass] Returns None if is_fungible_v2 != Some(false) - can attacker manipulate is_fungible_v2 flag to bypass NFT ownership tracking? (High)

[File: v2_token_ownerships.rs::TokenOwnershipV2::get_nft_v2_from_token_data()] [ObjectCore Missing Context] Panics if ObjectCore missing with context message - can this be triggered to crash indexer during token processing? (Critical)

[File: v2_token_ownerships.rs::TokenOwnershipV2::get_nft_v2_from_token_data()] [Self-Transfer Skip] Skips transfer if to == from address - can this be exploited to hide real transfers by setting fake self-transfers? (Medium)

[File: v2_token_ownerships.rs::TokenOwnershipV2::get_nft_v2_from_token_data()] [Transfer Event Index Negation] Previous ownership write_set_change_index set to -1 * event_index - can negative indices cause ordering issues or collisions? (Medium)

[File: v2_token_ownerships.rs::TokenOwnershipV2::get_nft_v2_from_token_data()] [Soulbound Flag Manipulation] is_soulbound from allow_ungated_transfer - can this flag be manipulated to make soulbound tokens transferable? (High)

[File: v2_token_ownerships.rs::TokenOwnershipV2::get_burned_nft_v2_from_write_resource()] [Burn Detection via Hashset] Relies on tokens_burned hashset - can burn events be missed if not properly added to this set? (High)

[File: v2_token_ownerships.rs::TokenOwnershipV2::get_burned_nft_v2_from_delete_resource()] [Prior Ownership Lookup Fallback] Falls back to database if not in prior_nft_ownership - can race conditions cause incorrect owner in burn records? (Medium)

[File: v2_token_ownerships.rs::TokenOwnershipV2::get_burned_nft_v2_from_delete_resource()] [Missing NFT Error Handling] Logs error but returns Ok(None) if NFT not found - can this silently skip burn events? (High)

[File: v2_token_ownerships.rs::TokenOwnershipV2::get_ft_v2_from_write_resource()] [FungibleStore Type Check] Only processes if V2FungibleAssetResource type - can custom fungible types bypass this check? (Medium)

[File: v2_token_ownerships.rs::TokenOwnershipV2::get_ft_v2_from_write_resource()] [Frozen Flag as Soulbound] frozen field used as is_soulbound_v2 - can this create incorrect soulbound status for temporary freezes? (Medium)

[File: v2_token_ownerships.rs::TokenOwnershipV2::get_ft_v2_from_write_resource()] [Balance from FungibleStore] Amount taken directly from inner.balance - can this be out of sync with actual token supply? (Medium)

[File: v2_token_ownerships.rs::TokenOwnershipV2::get_v1_from_write_table_item()] [V1 TokenStore Filter] Returns None if table_type != '0x3::token::TokenStore' - can this miss V1 tokens in custom stores? (Medium)

[File: v2_token_ownerships.rs::TokenOwnershipV2::get_v1_from_write_table_item()] [Missing Table Metadata Warning] Logs warning when metadata missing - can this allow ownerships with None owner_address? (High)

[File: v2_token_ownerships.rs::TokenOwnershipV2::get_v1_from_delete_table_item()] [Delete Zero Amount] Deleted ownerships set amount to zero - can this hide burn events or create phantom ownerships? (Medium)

[File: v2_token_ownerships.rs::CurrentTokenOwnershipV2Query::get_nft_by_token_data_id()] [Retry Logic DoS] Retries 5 times with 500ms delay - can many concurrent calls cause database connection exhaustion? (Medium)

[File: v2_token_activities.rs::TokenActivityV2::get_ft_v2_from_parsed_event()] [Token Detection False Negative] Queries both metadata and database to detect tokens - can race conditions cause fungible assets to be incorrectly classified as non-tokens? (Medium)

[File: v2_token_activities.rs::TokenActivityV2::get_ft_v2_from_parsed_event()] [Fungible Store Owner from ObjectCore] Uses object_core.get_owner_address() - can this be incorrect if ObjectCore owner != actual token owner? (High)

[File: v2_token_activities.rs::TokenActivityV2::get_ft_v2_from_parsed_event()] [Missing Before/After Values] before_value and after_value always None for FT events - can this hide balance changes in activity tracking? (Low)

[File: v2_token_activities.rs::TokenActivityV2::get_nft_v2_from_parsed_event()] [Event Type Address Confusion] Different events use different addresses (mint/burn from collection, others from token) - can this create inconsistent activity logs? (Medium)

[File: v2_token_activities.rs::TokenActivityV2::get_nft_v2_from_parsed_event()] [Missing Metadata Skip] Returns None if token_data_id not in metadata - can legitimate activities be silently dropped? (High)
